q: Reid, who dealt with family problems when two of his sons were arrested on drug charges, believed Michael Vick could change around his life. Few of Michael Vick 's supporters have been as staunchly behind him as Reid. He had a plan and he stuck to that, both on and off the field, Reid said. "He knew certain things he wanted to get better at and he was open to the coaching on it, and he got himself back into shape.... So, he did a great job

servant of this country". David Cameron said he was saddened by his departure, adding he felt his communications director was "being punished twice for the same offence." The PM said: This is all about the past. It has gone on and on and I can understand why he feels the pressure of that. "I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me for the government and for the country. He has run the Downing Street press office in a very straightforward, professional and competent way . David Cameron said he compared Andy Coulson 's regime favourably to "the days of dodgy dossiers, Alastair Campbell , Damian McBride , and all that nonsense we had from the past government". LONDON( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron began looking for a new media chief Saturday to replace Andy Coulson after he quit over a tabloid phone-hacking row, in a test for the nine-month-old government. So far, our worst day in government, a senior David Cameron aide told The Guardian after Andy Coulson quit Friday, bowing to pressure over what he knew about hacking at the News of the World( NOTW) when he was its editor. Eric Schmidt will continue to work for Google, assuming the role of Executive Chairman. By elevating me and having Larry running things day to day, we think this will produce even better results for the corporation, Eric Schmidt said on Thursday's earnings call. a blog post, Eric Schmidt said the management change arose out of a discussion about simplifying Google's management structure and streamlining its decision making process. With Theo Ratliff on the injured list and Matt Geiger suspended, Allen Iverson outplayed Kobe Bryant and the 76ers used a platoon of reserve centers to deal with Shaquille O'Neal en route to an impressive 112-97 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers. We knew we were outmatched. We didn't have two of our big men, but we just knew we had to come out and play some ball, Allen Iverson said after scoring 40 points and handing out nine assists in 40 minutes. Although he tried to debunk the idea in Thursday's interview, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies. I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped, said Ken Auletta , author of "Googled: The End of the World As We Know It." "I think Eric Schmidt is burned out." possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role. He said he wants to remain in private life although he is happy to be an informal presidential advisor. The administration knows that I am quite content with the work I am doing now, he said. "I am not interested in a government job." Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded Rep.
